name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Carl DAVIS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Carl DAVIS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of August, 1999, we GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal.
It is further ordered that this matter is consolidated with Commonwealth v. Valentin, 66 W.D. Appeal Docket 1999, Commonwealth v. Strickler, 117 M.D. Appeal Docket 1999, and Commonwealth v. Freeman, 115-116 M.D. Appeal Docket 1999.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Basil G. Rusin, Public Defender, William Russo, Asst. Public Defender.
casebody.head_matter:
737 A.2d 732
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Carl DAVIS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 27, 1999.
Basil G. Rusin, Public Defender, William Russo, Asst. Public Defender.
